name: Private Dance VR
description:
Have you ever dreamt of owning a strip club? If so, then you've come to the right place!

This game will provide you with your very own strip club! You can sit back on enjoy the sexy girls walking on stage. If you would like some more from them, simply click on one of the girls and you'll be immediately transported to a private room where the girl of your choice will give you a hot private dance!

There are seven beautiful ladies in this game to entertain you and fulfill your deepest fantasies! What are you waiting for? Come check them out! They're eagerly waiting for you ;)
